message: Let's get this done quickly. 70/30 split seems fair considering the circumstances.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable, time is money for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate the attempt at compromise, but your offer doesn't reflect the faster rate of inflation you face. I'm proposing a 65/35 split. Let's settle this before it gets any worse for you.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a more balanced split that acknowledges the time pressure.  Let's end this.
